description:
An old woman sacrifices herself to bring prosperity to a starving village.  A demon god repairs a destroyed temple.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Granny Orin and the Bottle Rock / The Madara Demon God and Kannon-sama
Orin Baa to Tokkuri Iwa / Madara Kishin to Kannon-sama
おりん婆ととっくり岩 / マダラ鬼神と観音さま
